title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 852/94 of 15 April 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 890/78 laying down detailed rules for the certification of hops
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 852/94 of 15 April 1994 amending Regulation (EEC) No 890/78 laying down detailed rules for the certification of hops
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In point (c) of Article 10 of Regulation (EEC) No 890/78, the following text is hereby added:
'In the case of blends of hops, the following additional indication must be included on the document and on the package:
"Mixture of hops for own use; may not be marketed".'

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
